events.message: I ordered a jacket last week and just received the wrong size. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under 'Refund' due to customer requesting return and money back for wrong size item.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to assist the customer with their refund request.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m here to help you with the return and refund process for your jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm the size you received versus the size you originally ordered?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I ordered a medium size jacket but received a large instead.
Thank you for the details. We will arrange a pickup of the incorrect jacket and send you the correct medium size. If unavailable, we will process a full refund immediately.
That sounds good, thank you for your prompt help. I appreciate you handling this quickly.
The pickup was scheduled and your replacement jacket has been dispatched. If the medium jacket is unavailable, a refund will be applied on your payment method within 3 days.
Just following up to confirm you have received the correct jacket or refund. Please let us know if any further assistance is needed.
We are closing this case as successful with your confirmation of receiving the correct item or refund. Thank you for contacting support.
